0.text: Bug 7557  Properties page unresponsive after reopening.

1.text: Build: 20020109  After making the Properties view a fast view and then closing it, the view does  not respond to mouse clicks when reopened.

2.text: View remains unresponsive until  Eclipse is restarted.

3.text: Tested in both Java and Resource perspectives.

7.text: Open a Properties view through Perspective->Show View->Properties, restore  the view if it appears as a fast view.

9.text: Drag the view to the shortcut bar to make it a fast view.

11.text: Click the icon in the shortcut bar to pop up the properties view.

15.text: Re-open the Properties view through Perspective->Show View->Properties 7.

16.text: The view appears as a regular view, but does not respond to mouse movement  or clicks.

18.text: If Eclipse is closed and restarted  the Properties view shows up in the same location and now works normally.
